Question: What is the relationship between the character Suhasini Devi Azad and ACP Jay Balram Azad in *Satyameva Jayate 2*?
Options:
A. A) Suhasini is the twin sister of ACP Jay Balram Azad.
B. B) Suhasini is the mother of ACP Jay Balram Azad.
C. C) Suhasini is the wife of ACP Jay Balram Azad.
D. D) Suhasini is the daughter of ACP Jay Balram Azad.
Answer: B) Suhasini is the mother of ACP Jay Balram Azad.
